contents.item: Focus is the soul of success.
In order to pick something up, you've got to put something down.
It's not always that we need to do more but rather that we need to focus on less.
As long as you allow your past to haunt you, you'll never be free to pursue your future. You won't even be able to focus on your present.
contents.owner: Brian Klemmer, The Compassionate Samurai: Being Extraordinary in an Ordinary World

contents.item: Focus on the highest, clearest, and most meaningful teaching you can find, and let all else go.
Keep your eyes on the prize for you cant hit an unseen target but don't forget to pay the price
